hanzi-su-wiki:
囲

Значения

Огораживать, окружать

Мнемоника

Ограда 囗 колодца 井 для его защиты от загрязнения и разрушения.

Варианты

圍, 围

周囲(しゅうい): circumference, surroundings, environs

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The mouth of a well will surround you if you fall into it. The mouth of a well is the opening of the well, and if you fall into that well, the mouth as well as the rest of the well will surround you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture yourself surrounded by this well on all sides. You look up and you can barely see the mouth of the well where you fell in and now you are trapped. Imagine how scared you are. Imagine trying to claw your way up the sides of the well but all you do is break your nails on the walls.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The well walls surround you as you look up to the mouth once again. This time you see an eagle (い) flying overhead. You call out to the eagle to save you and the eagle comes swooping down into the well and flies you out to safety. What a nice eagle!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: This eagle is basically a superhero. Imagine an eagle dressed in a superman outfit. He’s your savior. Imagine your gratitude towards this eagle superhero.
Ru_Meaning: surround, besiege, store, paling, enclosure, encircle, preserve, keep
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the well (井) is in the box (囗) - it's well-surrounded (!)

囲
Name meaning
Nothing.
wéi
яп. вм. 围
Radicals: 口, 井  (mouth, well)
Meaning Mnemonic
The mouth of a well will surround you if you fall into it. The mouth of a well is the opening of the well, and if you fall into that well, the mouth as well as the rest of the well will surround you.
Picture yourself surrounded by this well on all sides. You look up and you can barely see the mouth of the well where you fell in and now you are trapped. Imagine how scared you are. Imagine trying to claw your way up the sides of the well but all you do is break your nails on the walls.
Reading Mnemonic
The well walls surround you as you look up to the mouth once again. This time you see an eagle (い) flying overhead. You call out to the eagle to save you and the eagle comes swooping down into the well and flies you out to safety. What a nice eagle!
This eagle is basically a superhero. Imagine an eagle dressed in a superman outfit. He’s your savior. Imagine your gratitude towards this eagle superhero.
